```scss
// Property: showAsAction
// Description: A set of flags that controls how this item appears in the action bar.
// Component(s): Ti.Android.MenuItem
'.show-as-action-always': { showAsAction: Ti.Android.SHOW_AS_ACTION_ALWAYS }
'.show-as-action-collapse-view': { showAsAction: Ti.Android.SHOW_AS_ACTION_COLLAPSE_ACTION_VIEW }
'.show-as-action-if-room': { showAsAction: Ti.Android.SHOW_AS_ACTION_IF_ROOM }
'.show-as-action-never': { showAsAction: Ti.Android.SHOW_AS_ACTION_NEVER }
'.show-as-action-with-text': { showAsAction: Ti.Android.SHOW_AS_ACTION_WITH_TEXT }
```
